about_the_game:
[Checkout] is a psychological horror walking simulator where players attempt to escape from continuously changing hotel corridors. This game delivers a terrifying world through Unreal Engine 5's realistic environments and a soundtrack that maximizes tension, providing players with a new dimension of fear. As the game progresses, the secrets of the Hilbert Hotel's past events and their effects on the present are gradually revealed, deepening the mystery for players to unravel.

Key Features:

  • Psychological Horror: Persistent pursuit by an ominous and unpredictable presence keeps the tension constant.

  • Dynamic Game Environment: Each escape attempt introduces new areas and environments, each offering unique challenges and elements of fear.

  • Story-Driven Gameplay: Clues about mysterious events at the Hilbert Hotel are uncovered, slowly revealing a complex story intertwined with past and present.

  • Detailed Visuals and Sound: The high-level visuals and soundtrack created with Unreal Engine 5 intensify the suspense of each scenario, making players feel as if they are truly in the location.

[Gameplay] Players navigate through the endlessly unfolding corridors of the hotel, with each escape attempt involving the unraveling of pieces of the mystery. Each new area entered presents different forms of terror and challenges, and players must solve puzzles found along the way by following phone instructions from staff to track down the truth.

Caution: Checkout is designed to offer genuine horror. It induces strong psychological tension and anxiety, so players sensitive to horror should proceed with caution when playing this game.

name: CheckOut

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10, 64 Bit
  • Processor: Intel i5 or new-gen i3 / AMD equivalent
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX™ 1660
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 6 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10, 64 Bit
  • Processor: Intel i7 or AMD equivalent (AMD FX 9500+ Series)
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce RTX™ 3060
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 6 GB available space

short_description: Checkout is a psychological horror walking simulator where players attempt to escape from endlessly looping hotel corridors. The game delivers an intense immersion with its tension-building soundtrack and realistic graphics. Unravel the hidden stories and find your way out of the hotel.
supported_languages:
Japanese, English*, Korean, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Russian, Simplified Chinese, Traditional Chinese, Turkish, Portuguese - Portugal
*languages with full audio support
